name: Ogre
description: Ogres are massive, brutish humanoids known for their incredible strength and appetite for destruction. They are often found as marauders, bandits, or mercenaries, terrorizing the countryside. Ogres are not known for their intelligence, but their sheer size and power make them a formidable threat to any who cross them.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common and Giant.
special: Brute: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the ogre hits with it (included in the attack).
